BNC User Reference Guide

<tagsDecl>

tagsDecl (tagging declaration) provides information about the XML elements actually used within a BNC text.
Class model.encodingPart
Declaration 
element tagsDecl { namespace* }
Attributes
(Global attributes only)
Example
 <tagsDecl
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <namespace name="">
   <tagUsage gi="bibl" occurs="17"/>
   <tagUsage gi="c" occurs="4348"/>...</namespace>
 </tagsDecl>
;
Module header
